name: Gehinnom
description:
Gehinnom is a randomly generated multiplayer horror game for 1-4 players.
Banish the demon chasing you by performing a ritual. You will have to find out what items are needed for the ritual by collecting clues you can obtain from solving various random quests.




In Gehinnom, a sense of fear is assured due to the game's complete reliance on randomness in every aspect, from room layouts and roads to furniture placement, clues locations, quests, jump scares, demon's attack patterns, traps, and even the smallest details like rocks on the road and unpredictable weather.




Gehinnom also features a PvP mode where one player becomes the demon and hunts the players before they complete the ritual.
As the demon player, you begin the game in the form of a ghost, and your spawn meter fills up as you terrify the human players by utilizing the environment around them.
Additionally, every human player has their own fear meter, which rises as they come across scary situations, a player with a fear meter maxed out at 100% becomes highly vulnerable to your attacks.



Even in death, your contribution remains essential for the ritual's success.
As a ghost player, you can still complete some quests and communicate with your team to provide information about clues and items locations.



  • Public & Private Lobbies
  • Voice chat (Proximity) & Chat Box
  • Controller support (XBOX/PS)
  • Keybind for keyboard
  • Achievements
  • Dynamic weather
  • Hardcore mode
  • Secrets
